definition: to support/to sustain/to erect/to raise/branch/division/to draw money/classifier for rods such as pens and guns, for army divisions and for songs or compositions
seat/base/stand/CL:個|个[ge4]/classifier for buildings, mountains and similar immovable objects

sentences.english: There are also two supports and connections to receive future footbridges .
sentences.chinese: 亦有兩个支座及連接点接驳日后的行人天桥。

sentences.english: Most large-scale buildings now have steel supports.
sentences.chinese: 现在多数大规模的建筑物都有钢材支座。

sentences.english: This paper also analyzes the cost and key technological measures for steel carrying pole method.
sentences.chinese: 总结了钢扁担梁更换支座的关键技术措施。

sentences.english: Weld the sealing seat to wall to support the front of soot-blower.
sentences.chinese: 密封支座与炉墙焊接固定，支承吹灰器头部。

sentences.english: Inert gas arc weld the spring strut mount.
sentences.chinese: 惰性气体电弧焊减震器支座。

sentences.english: They have built all the supports of the bridge.
sentences.chinese: 他们已经建好了桥梁所有的支座。

sentences.english: Bridge bearing is a weak constructional element, so its earthquake resistant ability should be strengthened.
sentences.chinese: 支座是一种薄弱构件，其抗震能力必须加强。

sentences.english: The gun traverses smoothly on its bearings.
sentences.chinese: 大炮在支座上旋转自如。

sentences.english: The results shown that the design of the support plate can meet the strength requirements.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明支座板的设计满足强度要求。

sentences.english: Loosen trailing arm on front-axle cross member and pull out of the mount.
sentences.chinese: 松开前轴横梁上的拖臂并从支座中拔出。

sentences.english: The Lead-Rubber-Bearing (LRB) is a type of isolation device in its entirety.
sentences.chinese: 铅销橡胶支座是整体型减隔震装置的一种。

sentences.english: Moreover, it is also found that Vierendeel arch is not sensitive to initial imperfect and change of the constraint condition.
sentences.chinese: 支座约束和初始缺陷对空腹拱的承载力无明显影响。

sentences.english: What's more, it also proves that LRB has a great effect on reducing structural dynamic response.
sentences.chinese: 设置LRB隔震支座，对地震响应有显著的削减作用。

sentences.english: BIL located between pile caps and the super structure, mainly consisting of laminated rubber bearings and viscous dampers.
sentences.chinese: 隔震层由叠层橡胶隔震支座和粘滞阻尼器组成。

sentences.english: This paper presents the design and realization of a measurement system for the pedestal of coordinator.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种位标器支座测试系统的设计和实现。

sentences.english: Erect the electric engine on the supporting foundation, make the output end face down, and suspend.
sentences.chinese: 将电机直立在支座上，使机轴输出端向下，且悬空。

definition: to support/to bear the weight of (a building)
bolt (male component of nut and bolt)/screw
a boom (i.e. transverse beam for hanging objects)
roof/roof plate/rock layer forming roof of a cave or mine/abacus
a building/the frame of a building/roof beam/truss
